explanation: [0-0] A man with short black hair, wearing a black short-sleeved polo shirt, stands in front of a metal counter in a small shop. He has a watch with a silver metal band and a bracelet on his left wrist and holds a silver bottle opener in his right hand. Behind him is a red Coca-Cola crate filled with glass Coca-Cola bottles. In front of him is a metal container filled with ice and more Coca-Cola bottles, the Cokes are turning inside. On the counter are a white plastic cup and a rag.

[0-9] The man rotates the bottle opener in his hand. He picks up a Coca-Cola bottle from the ice with his left hand, taps the bottom of the bottle with the opener, shakes it, wipes the bottom of the bottle on the rag, holds the bottle's mouth with his right hand, and uses his left hand to wipe off the water from the bottle. Then he holds the bottle with his left hand and opens the cap with the bottle opener in his right hand. Subsequently, he pours the Coke into the white plastic cup and puts the opener on the rag.
